title: 40X Mendosa Avenue (1 Quintara Street)

title: 145 Guerrero Street

title: 2356 15th Street

title: 254 Roosevelt Way

title: 599X Ogden Avenue (598 Banks Street)
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787709) for three trees; date palm on corner too large of a species for confined space, no space for growth, root will eventually damage retaining wall and foundation, and will eventually grow into high voltage powerlines; property owner will replace with a small stature tree. Two queen palms are damaging windows and building facade, and will eventually grow into high voltage power lines;
